metadata.title: CVE-2023-45231 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when processingÂ  Neighbor Discovery Redirect message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
